content: this pattern was written after the piece was completed so unfortunately there are only photos of the finished object thanks to a reddit user who named this wacky guy greg materials * yarn - any weight * hook - any size to match the yarn you re using * yarn in a second color to embroider the face * polyfill for stuffing * optional safety eyes pipe cleaners to insert in the arms/legs notes * gauge doesn t really matter - just match your hook size to the yarn you choose * using a 4mm hook and mystery acrylic yarn from my stash greg is about 9 inches tall and 3 5 inches wide * legs are 6 inches tall body is 3 inches tall
